definition[0]: when the police, army etc watch a person or place carefully because they may be connected with criminal activities
example[0]: The suspects were kept under surveillance.
example[3]: They were under constant close surveillance day and night.
definition[1]: when one country watches the military activities of another country to see what they are planning to do
definition[2]: when doctors, health departments etc watch an ill person or watch the development of a disease in a population
example[6]: Diane was placed under psychiatric surveillance.
